name: Inferno
effect:
:activation: Select a space. Now roll and [Attack die](../dice.md#attack-die) \*. All [units](../units/index.md) on this and the adjacent spaces take 1 :damage: for every "+1" rolled.

:empower: 0 ➣ \*once
:empower: 1 ➣ \*twice
:empower: 2 ➣ \*4 times

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: The :damage: from Inferno also applies to friendly units.
